skills.name: Understanding angles as a number of 360ths of a circle

explanations.A: This is how many degrees are in one turn to find out how many degrees are in 1/360 of a turn you need to do 360 x 1/360...
explanations.B: This would be how many degrees in 1/10 of a turn. In a full turn there are 360 degrees so to find how many degrees in 1/360 of a turn do 360 x 1/360...
explanations.C: There are 360 degrees in a turn so in 1/360 of a turn there is 1 degree because 360 x 1/360 = 1
explanations.D: In a full turn there are 360 degrees so to find how many degrees in 1/360 of a turn do 360 x 1/360...

explanations.A: There are 360 degrees in a turn so in 1/45 of a turn there is 8 degrees because 360 x 1/45 = 8
explanations.B: In a full turn there are 360 degrees so to find how many degrees in 1/45 of a turn do 360 x 1/45...
explanations.C: This would be how many degrees in 1/10 of a turn. In a full turn there are 360 degrees so to find how many degrees in 1/45 of a turn do 360 x 1/45...
explanations.D: This is the denominator but to find out how many degrees are in 1/45 of a turn you need to do 360 x 1/45...

explanations.A: What has 10 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.B: What has 10 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.C: 10 x 36 = 360 so we need to do the same to the numerator 1 x 36 = 36 therefore the missing value from the boxes is 36
explanations.D: 10 is 1/10 of 100 but we need to do 1/10 of 360...

explanations.A: What has 5 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.B: What has 5 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.C: 20 is 1/5 of 100 but we need to do 1/5 of 360...
explanations.D: 5 x 72 = 360 so we need to do the same to the numerator 1 x 72 = 72 therefore the missing value from the boxes is 72

explanations.A: What has 3 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.B: 3 x 120 = 360 we need to do the same to the numerator 1 x 120 = 120 therefore the missing value from the boxes is 120
explanations.C: We don't subtract/ add to when finding equivalent fractions, we divide/ multiply. What has 3 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.D: This would be 1/3 of 100 but we need to find 1/3 of 360...

explanations.A: 9 x 40 = 360 we need to do the same to the numerator 4 x 40 = 160 therefore the missing value from the boxes is 160
explanations.B: We don't subtract/ add to when finding equivalent fractions, we divide/ multiply. What has 9 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.C: This would be 4/9 of 100 but we need to find 4/9 of 360...
explanations.D: What has 9 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...

explanations.A: This is 1/8 of 360 but we need 5/8...
explanations.B: 8 x 45 = 360 so to find the numerator we do 5 x 45 = 225 therefore the missing number from the boxes is 225
explanations.C: This is 360 รท 5 but we need to do 360 รท 8 to find 1/8 of 360 and then multiply this value by 5...
explanations.D: We don't subtract/ add to when finding equivalent fractions, we divide/ multiply. What has 8 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...

explanations.A: We don't subtract/ add to when finding equivalent fractions, we divide/ multiply. What has 9 been multiplied by to get 360? Do the same to the numerator...
explanations.B: This is 1/9 of 360 but we need 7/9...
explanations.C: 9 x 40 = 360 so to find the numerator we do 7 x 40 = 280 therefore the missing number from the boxes is 280
explanations.D: This is 360 รท 7 but we need to do 360 รท 9 to find 1/9 of 360 and then multiply this value by 7...

explanations.A: To find the size of the angle think about what 179/180 is as fraction of 360: 179/180 = ?/360...
explanations.B: You have the correct method of multiplying 179 by 2 but you've made a mistake in your calculation...
explanations.C: There are 360 degrees in a circle. 179/180 = 358/360 therefore the angle is 358 degrees
explanations.D: 179 is one less than 180 but there are two pieces of 180 in 360... Think about what 179/180 is as fraction of 360: 179/180 = ?/360...

explanations.A: You have the correct method of multiplying 77 by 3 but you've made a mistake in your calculation...
explanations.B: 77 is 43 less than 120 but there are three pieces of 120 in 360... Think about what 77/120 is as fraction of 360: 77/120 = ?/360...
explanations.C: To find the size of the angle think about what 77/120 is as fraction of 360: 77/120 = ?/360...
explanations.D: There are 360 degrees in a circle. 77/120 = 231/360 therefore the angle is 231 degrees
